title: Procedural Semantics-Based Instructional Design for Advanced Mathematical Text Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematical modeling and advanced statistical analysis fundamentals
context.additional_context: Strengthens strategic thinking training to interpret and organize complex textual structures of mathematical concepts

learning_goals: Learners can explain systematic procedures for deconstructing and reconstructing the semantic structures of various mathematical texts
Learners can design mathematical problem-solving strategies by applying procedural semantics principles
Learners can visually represent complex mathematical concepts using text-concept mapping techniques
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
